TAGNS-PROJ-ROLE-KEY.name: tn-lzp-proj-role
TAGNS-PROJ-ROLE-KEY.description: Tag namespace for Tag Based Access Controls of Project Roles

TAG-PROJ-ROLE-KEY.name: proj-admin
TAG-PROJ-ROLE-KEY.description: Tag to identify any project team member.

TAG-APP-ROLE-KEY.name: app-admin
TAG-APP-ROLE-KEY.description: Tag to identify application administrators project members.

TAG-DB-ROLE-KEY.name: db-admin
TAG-DB-ROLE-KEY.description: Tag to identify database administrators project members.

TAG-INFRA-ROLE-KEY.name: infra-admin
TAG-INFRA-ROLE-KEY.description: Tag to identify infrastructure administrators project members.
